# init(viewportSize:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new 3D node.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(viewportSize: CGSize)
```

```swift
init(viewportSize: CGSize)
```

## Parameters

- **viewportSize**: The size of the nodeâ€™s rendered image.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SK3DNode] object.

## Creating 3D Nodes

- **init(coder:)**: Tells you when to initialize a 3D node that has been unarchived.
